description:
Today's post should be me rage quitting the hobby and setting fire to my existing Stormcast Eternals models but I'm not doing that. Instead out of the hypothetical fires are born a new Stormiest, ready to march forth into a different Realm and a new edition of Age of Sigmar.

The post Showcase: Stormcast Eternals Knight Vexillor with Banner of Apotheosis appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: Showcase: Stormcast Eternals Knight Vexillor with Banner of Apotheosis

description:
In this edition of Stahly's Paint Picks, we're going chocolaty. I'll show you a colour palette of 8 paints, starting with a light latte macchiato, going through mocha, and ending with a warm, dark chocolate brown. Perfect for painting leather, dark skin, horses, and much more.

The post ToP Tip: The best gold & copper paints appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: ToP Tip: The best gold & copper paints
